allow: Bash(wsl.exe -e bash -c "python3 -c ''try: import claude_code_sdk; print(""Claude SDK: True""); except: print(""Claude SDK: False"")''")
Bash(wsl.exe -e bash -c "python3 -c ''try: import cursor_agent; print(""Cursor SDK: True""); except: print(""Cursor SDK: False"")''")

Bash(wsl.exe -e bash -c "python3 -c ''try:
    import claude_code_sdk
    print(""Claude SDK: True"")
except ImportError:
    print(""Claude SDK: False"")''")
Bash(wsl.exe -e bash -c "python3 -c ''import pkgutil, cursor_agent; print([name for _, name, _ in pkgutil.iter_modules(cursor_agent.__path__)])''")
Bash(wsl.exe -e bash -c "which cursor-agent 2>&1 || echo ''cursor-agent not found in PATH''")
